maxCapacity.description: Maximum capacity for an Aurora DB cluster in `serverless` DB engine mode. The maximum capacity must be greater than or equal to the minimum capacity. Valid Aurora MySQL capacity values are `1`, `2`, `4`, `8`, `16`, `32`, `64`, `128`, `256`. Valid Aurora PostgreSQL capacity values are (`2`, `4`, `8`, `16`, `32`, `64`, `192`, and `384`). Defaults to `16`.

minCapacity.description: Minimum capacity for an Aurora DB cluster in `serverless` DB engine mode. The minimum capacity must be lesser than or equal to the maximum capacity. Valid Aurora MySQL capacity values are `1`, `2`, `4`, `8`, `16`, `32`, `64`, `128`, `256`. Valid Aurora PostgreSQL capacity values are (`2`, `4`, `8`, `16`, `32`, `64`, `192`, and `384`). Defaults to `1`.
